title: Grafana MCP Integration
description: Integrate official grafana/mcp-grafana server via FastMCP proxy. Tools: search_dashboards, get_dashboard_by_uid, update_dashboard, query_prometheus (instant/range), list_prometheus_metric_metadata, query_loki_logs, list_alert_rules, list_oncall_schedules. Provides live Grafana/Prometheus/Loki access within NthLayer MCP workflows. No custom code needed - just mount as proxy.
